attributes.additional_details:
Why make students taking GCSE's in 2012 suffer from harsher marking than those who sat in 2011!

It is ridiculous that this year's students end up with poorer grades because someone decides to move the goal posts.

If a fundamental change is required then this should be carried out, do not just tinker!!

It is wrong students who would have gained a Grade C in 2011 fail to do so in 2012!!
